snippet: The presidential candidates and their supporters are offering one last burst of activity in a handful of swing states that will determine the occupant of the Oval Office next year.

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro contributed reporting from Sanford, Fla., and Helene Cooper from Madison, Wis.

lead_paragraph: The presidential candidates and their supporters are offering one last burst of activity in a handful of swing states that will determine the occupant of the Oval Office next year.

headline.seo: Sprint Through Swing States in Campaign’s Last Hours
headline.main: A Sprint Through Swing States in the Campaign’s Last Hours
headline.print_headline: A Sprint Through Swing States in the Campaign’s Last Hours
